post.description: Send an invitation to a user to join a group (admin only if invite_policy is 'admin', any member if invite_policy is 'all_members')

delete.description: Allows a user to leave a group they are a member of. If the user is the only admin, they cannot leave the group.

get.description: Get all members of a specific group

delete.description: Remove a member from a group (admin can remove any member, members can remove themselves)

post.description: Add a user directly to a group (based on invite_policy, only admin or any member can add)
